text: Vicente Asumu Esono Bindang (born 30 October 2002), also known as Vicente Esono and Jordan, is an Equatorial Guinean footballer who plays as a defender for Cano Sport Academy and the Equatorial Guinea national team. ==International career== Asumu made his international debut for Equatorial Guinea on 28 July 2019. ==References== Category:2002 births Category:Living people Category:Association football defenders Category:Equatoguinean footballers Category:Cano Sport Academy players Category:Equatorial Guinea youth international footballers Category:Equatorial Guinea international footballers Category:Equatoguinean people of Gabonese descent
title: Vicente Esono
